title: Man Dark Skin Tone Blond Hair
alsoKnownAs: Dark skin tone man with blond hair
description: A man with dark skin tone and blond hair, representing a specific demographic. Used to represent individuals or to add diversity to depictions.
apple_vendor_description: The man with dark skin tone and blond hair on Apple devices is depicted with a strong, friendly countenance, benefiting from Apple's smooth gradients and soft rounded edges. His features are clearly defined, and the contrast between his skin tone and the flowing blond hair is striking, showcasing Apple's attention to detail. This emoji on Apple devices conveys a sense of approachability, individuality, and a modern aesthetic.
